concept.description: Sets labels :Assert and :Camunda for Camunda BPMN assert methods.
concept.cypher: MATCH (assertType:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(assertMethod) WHERE assertType.fqn = 'org.camunda.bpm.engine.test.assertions.bpmn.BpmnAwareTests' AND assertMethod.signature =~ '.* assert.*' SET assertMethod:Camunda:Assert RETURN assertMethod
